resources.string: An unknown error occurred, please contact support!
No internet, check your internet connection.
Page not found, please contact support!
Host not available, please contact support!
Request timeout, check your internet connection and try again!
Empty response body returned, please contact support!
Request not allowed/authorized for client, please contact support!
Using wrong method type, please contact support!
Media file is not supported, please contact support!
SSO enabled, cannot perform this action, please contact support!
Your account is not verified. A verification email has already been sent. Please check your inbox and spam folder.
